Articles.Content:
I have a bug where my parts go missing. It seems to happen after I have to force quit the game do to it freezing up.

System:

Mac OS X 10.9.5

Intel Core i7 3.4 GHz

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680MX 2048 MB

16 GB of ram memory

KSP version: 0.25.0

Mods:

Screenshot of issue.

Player.log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ie0w00twpipt3dr/Player.log?dl=0

Other info:

I am using ATM 3-5, because 3-7 was causing the game to freeze up on load.

Need anymore info?
hmm... Did you try reinstalling the mods that are spewing the missing part errors?

Radish doesn't work, because TacLifeSupport is not installed.

I'm not sure about the rest since they seem to load just fine, but tweakscale is messing with those parts. Try removing tweakscale.

You also have some outdated mods installed, there are some textures failing to load because they're still in targa format. The affected mods are LLL, HGR, Tantares and Station Parts.
Has a workaround been found for the TGA bug?
